Chess Enthusiast: IT 422 Final Project

Created an informational website using basic HTML and CSS for a fictitious chess club. Mr. Chuck Wahle graded this as a final project for his Website Construction course in the spring of 2013.

Check out the Chess Enthusiast homepage.

I also created a repository for this project on my GitHub Account.
